trans-unit.source: You can create an ad to promote one of your apps in your other apps, for free.
trans-unit.target: You can create an ad to promote one of your apps in your other apps, for free.

trans-unit.source: You can create an ad to promote one of your apps in your other apps, for free.
trans-unit.target: You can create an ad to promote one of your apps in your other apps, for free.

trans-unit.source: To set up a house ad, select **House** as the **Campaign type** when you [create an ad campaign](create-an-ad-campaign-for-your-app.md).
trans-unit.target: To set up a house ad, select **House** as the **Campaign type** when you [create an ad campaign](create-an-ad-campaign-for-your-app.md).

trans-unit.source: The ad will automatically be eligible to appear in any app of yours that meets the following criteria:
trans-unit.target: The ad will automatically be eligible to appear in any app of yours that meets the following criteria:

trans-unit.source: The app must be for the same device type as the advertised app.
trans-unit.target: The app must be for the same device type as the advertised app.

trans-unit.source: The app must have at least one ad unit set up.
trans-unit.target: The app must have at least one ad unit set up.

trans-unit.source: When a house ad for App A appears in App B, you will not be charged for the impression, nor will you receive revenue for displaying the ad in your App B ad unit.
trans-unit.target: When a house ad for App A appears in App B, you will not be charged for the impression, nor will you receive revenue for displaying the ad in your App B ad unit.

trans-unit.source: Paid ads have priority over house ads to appear in your ad units.
trans-unit.target: Paid ads have priority over house ads to appear in your ad units.

trans-unit.source: **Note** An individual end user will see any given house ad a maximum of five times per day.
trans-unit.target: **Note** An individual end user will see any given house ad a maximum of five times per day.

trans-unit.source: Create an ad campaign for your app
trans-unit.target: Create an ad campaign for your app
